author: hlship
msg: TAPESTRY-1988: Page activation paremeter with escaped ( %2f ) slash ( " / " ) character not passed correctly

author: akarasulu
msg: changes to schema handling and entry creation ...
o adding new interface for creating entries
o setting default directory service to create bootstrap registries in the
default constructor or generally at class initialization rather than in
the initialize method
o fixed some issues in code which arose as a result of having to throw a
NamingException new in the constructor dude to bootstrap registry init within
this constructor
o this is all being done to be able to configure the server and it's partitions
with server entries that require some minimal schema information to be
properly constructed
More to come ...
o soon a means will be used to make the DirectoryService a factory for new
ServerEntry object instances that are schema aware - this is a preparatory
commit to reach that point

author: fuankg
msg: fixed comment, added comment, added logic to build mod_ssl by default if USE_STDSOCKETS is defined;
updated manual NetWare OpenSSL build section.

author: sidney
msg: bug 5748: fix locale problem with use of external sort by not sorting because the sort was not needed anyway
